FFlagEnableNoiseReductionForAudioDeviceI.mechanism: This flag activates a feature that reduces background noise when using audio devices for input.
FFlagEnableNoiseReductionForAudioDeviceI.purpose: It improves the clarity of voice chat by minimizing distracting sounds, making communication easier for players.

FFlagInitializeAutocompleteOnlyIfEnabled.mechanism: This flag activates a feature that helps players with suggestions while typing, but only if it's turned on in the settings.
FFlagInitializeAutocompleteOnlyIfEnabled.purpose: It makes it easier for players to find and enter commands or chat messages quickly, improving their overall experience.

FFlagUKOSALegacyReportMenu.mechanism: This flag allows the old reporting menu to be used for players in the UK, instead of the new version.
FFlagUKOSALegacyReportMenu.purpose: It ensures that players who are used to the old system can still report issues easily, providing a familiar way to communicate problems.

FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2.mechanism: This flag enables a new version of performance data tracking in Roblox, allowing the system to collect more detailed information about how well games are running.
FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2.purpose: It helps developers understand game performance better, leading to smoother gameplay and fewer issues for players.

FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPro.mechanism: This flag increases the distance that lights can reach in the game from 60 to 120 units, while also hiding certain settings from developers.
FFlagExtendLightRangeTo120HideRolloutPro.purpose: It enhances the visual quality of games by allowing for better lighting effects, making environments look more realistic and immersive for players.

DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD_Sta.mechanism: This flag allows the system to skip certain levels of detail for editable meshes, making rendering faster.
DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD_Sta.purpose: It helps improve performance in games by making them run smoother, especially when there are many complex objects on screen.

FFlagAddDismissTopBarFocus.mechanism: This flag enables a feature that allows players to easily dismiss or hide the top bar interface when it’s not needed.
FFlagAddDismissTopBarFocus.purpose: It gives players more control over their screen space, making it easier to focus on the game without distractions from the top bar.

FFlagAXCategoryPillAnimationsUserMotionS.mechanism: This flag enables new animations for user interface elements based on user interactions.
FFlagAXCategoryPillAnimationsUserMotionS.purpose: It makes the game feel smoother and more responsive when players interact with UI elements, enhancing the overall experience.

FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOn.mechanism: This flag allows the age rating of a game to be displayed when players hover over the game's tile, even if some details are hidden.
FFlagLuaAppShowAgeRatingWithPlayButtonOn.purpose: It helps players quickly see if a game is appropriate for them or their children before they click to play.

FStringTutorialUpsellPlaceId.mechanism: This flag controls whether a specific tutorial prompt appears in the game, encouraging players to try out new features.
FStringTutorialUpsellPlaceId.purpose: It helps players discover and learn about new game features, making their experience more enjoyable and engaging.

FFlagFixHapticWaveformReplication.mechanism: This flag enables a fix for how haptic feedback (vibrations) is sent to devices, ensuring it works correctly across different platforms.
FFlagFixHapticWaveformReplication.purpose: It improves the responsiveness and quality of haptic feedback, enhancing the immersive experience for players using compatible devices.

DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD.mechanism: This flag allows the game to skip certain detail levels when rendering 3D objects, making the process faster.
DFFlagEditableMeshFastClusterSkipLoD.purpose: It helps games run more smoothly by improving performance, especially in scenes with lots of 3D models.

FFlagUITextureRendererUseNewRenderPath.mechanism: This flag enables a new method for rendering user interface textures, which can improve visual quality and efficiency.
FFlagUITextureRendererUseNewRenderPath.purpose: It enhances the appearance of UI elements and can make them load faster, leading to a better overall experience for players.

FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused.mechanism: This flag changes how the top bar of the Roblox interface behaves when you click on it, focusing on improving user interaction.
FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused.purpose: It helps players have a smoother experience by making it easier to use the top bar, which contains important features like notifications and settings.

FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Stag.mechanism: This flag adjusts how text alignment is handled in the game, ensuring that text appears correctly based on its context.
FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Stag.purpose: It improves the readability of text in games, making it clearer and more relevant to players, which enhances their overall gaming experience.

FFlagAddFriendsConsistentFocusActions.mechanism: This flag ensures that the actions related to adding friends are consistently highlighted and easy to access across the platform.
FFlagAddFriendsConsistentFocusActions.purpose: It makes it simpler for players to find and use the friend-adding features, improving the overall social experience.

DFFlagAudioSpeechToTextRequireVoiceChat2.mechanism: This flag requires players to use voice chat in order to convert spoken words into text, enhancing the speech-to-text functionality.
DFFlagAudioSpeechToTextRequireVoiceChat2.purpose: It allows players to communicate more easily by turning their spoken words into text, making it accessible for those who prefer reading over listening.

FFlagEnableClientSettingAPIInProduction_.mechanism: This flag allows the game to use a new system for managing player settings directly on the client side.
FFlagEnableClientSettingAPIInProduction_.purpose: It helps players customize their game experience more easily and efficiently, making it smoother and more user-friendly.

FFlagAXFixBuyActionBarNotAppearing2.mechanism: This flag fixes a bug that caused the buy action bar to not show up when it was supposed to.
FFlagAXFixBuyActionBarNotAppearing2.purpose: It ensures that players can see and use the buy action bar correctly, improving their ability to purchase items in the game.
